Our Story Our Team Gallery Blog Careers Holiday Events Holiday Events Contact us about your holiday needs DRIVE-IN LASER SHOWS (CHRISTMAS, WINTER) Drive-in laser shows are a popular, weather-resistant entertainment option since 2020, with benefits like no noise worries and functionality in light rain. Customers love the stress-free, profitable drive-in experience, offering multiple nightly events and organized parking. Enjoy shows up to 45 minutes from your car, with radio-transmitted sound and optional sound systems, plus tailgating opportunities. Rain enhances the show without affecting comfort. Scale up easily for extra value and customize the event to your theme. Call 833-GLOW-EOP for versatile pricing based on venue size, power, and duration—the longer the event, the better the rate. Unmute to hear some of the music that we play at these events! Unmute to hear some of the music that we play at these events! Celebrate America We firmly believe in celebrating America any day, not just on special occasions. Our stunning laser show, perfect for enhancing your events like the 4th of July with national pride, is more than ready. With the 250th Anniversary of America's founding approaching in 2026, it's time to start planning your events and secure your entertainment, as our in-demand laser shows are booking up fast. Remember, we travel nationwide to bring our phenomenal laser entertainment to your doorstep, ensuring an unforgettable addition to your patriotic celebrations. Plan early and elevate your event with the memorable brilliance of our lasers. Join us in illuminating your American pride! LASER SHOW PRICING Laser shows are unique entertainment options where you need details to get an accurate quote. Different needs and budgets can be accommodated, scaling the spectacle up or down. To discuss a laser show for your event, call us at 252-764-7628 without any sales pressure. During the call, we'll discuss your objectives, desired show type (beam, graphic or combo), venue specifics, anticipated audience size, sound and power requirements, location, whether it’s a solo event, customized music needs, and your budget. Our talented programmers design shows to music and offer package deals for multi-night events, reducing the cost per night significantly. One-time shows are pricier due to fixed overheads, but shared packages or revenue-split events can make them more affordable. At Emerald Owl Productions, we aim to find the right balance for a memorable laser show experience within your budget—multiple nightly shows also hardly impact the price. Once we have the initial details, future planning becomes simpler. We strive to overcome pricing challenges and bring your event to life, so let's collaborate!
